items.sentence: Tom told us a story about a monster that ate children.
We are supposed to take off our shoes at the entrance.
By the time you get out of prison, she\'ll be married.
Tom decided not to tell Mary about what John had done.
Tom described his new invention to both John and Mary.
It\'s clear that Tom has no intention of marrying you.
Tom did a lot for us, but he could\'ve done much more.
Tom did what he could for Mary, but it wasn\'t enough.
Tom didn\'t believe Mary would do something like that.
Tom didn\'t even look at the letter Mary wrote to him.
